title: Out of darkness
description: Thousands of American girls enter the commercial sex industry every year—and their ages have been dropping drastically.Cynthia Lange is one such girl. Sold into sex slavery by her own mother, Cynthia is eventually rescued by the FBI, and becomes a prominent physician at Brier Hospital in Berkeley, California.While she has escaped from “the life,” Cynthia can’t rid herself from its aftereffects, but she is intent on keeping her pas a secret. That is, until a patient shows up at Brier Hospital; someone from her past who threatens to reveal the truth and destroy what Cynthia has worked so hard to achieve. Raw, shocking, and ultimately inspirational, Out of Darkness proves that the human spirit can triumph over evil.
author: Lawrence W. Gold
